column3: While XSLT 3.0 offers much more functionality, the basic thing you want is that the IDE at least recognizes the same functionality as in 2.0. I think with these simple changes that should be fixed. Since I am not a Java developer, and also did not test this, you should take this PR with care.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
